metadata.description: Claude Code settings and skills for spec-driven development workflows

plugins.description: Claude Code settings, commands, agent and skills (all in one)

plugins.name: kiro-skill
plugins.description: Interactive feature development workflow from idea to implementation (Requirements → Design → Tasks → Execute)

plugins.name: spec-kit-skill
plugins.description: GitHub Spec-Kit integration for constitution-based spec-driven development (7-phase workflow)

plugins.name: codex-skill
plugins.description: Leverage OpenAI Codex (GPT-5/GPT-5.1) for non-interactive automation mode and hands-off task execution

plugins.name: nanobanana-skill
plugins.description: Generate or edit images using Google Gemini API via nanobanana

plugins.name: youtube-transcribe-skill
plugins.description: Extract subtitles/transcripts from YouTube videos via CLI or browser automation

plugins.name: autonomous-skill
plugins.description: Use when user wants to execute long-running tasks that require multiple sessions to complete. This skill manages task decomposition, progress tracking, and autonomous execution using Claude Code headless mode with auto-continuation. Trigger phrases: autonomous, long-running task, multi-session, 自主执行, 长时任务, autonomous skill.
